message.content: cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM. The paper deals with Visual Question Answering (VQA), which involves the intersection of computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), followed by cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also proposes a novel attention mechanism, which falls under the category of machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on VQA datasets, which involves multimodal fusion of visual and textual information, making cs.MM (Multimedia) a possible sub-category as well.
